post.body: we even warned you right at the beginning - really not sure what else we can do if people don't believe us...
- is that a data point or are you in Chicago watching it snow? :-)
oh man, that's funny partly because of the truth in it :-)
I am using Couyuan's one ( not sure spelling - on iPhone). Have to use netbeans nightly repo.
ha - finally got the new Adobe AIR 1.5 for linux working properly - welcome back twhirl... BTW - I would love to see a JavaFX twitter client
Disgusted at UPS - first they lie about attempting to deliver a package (been in all day), then their automated phone system hangs up on me
Editing and mixing Java Posse episode 222 - should be up later today
DSL back up thanks to my new actiontek modem - phew - life without the internet sucks
Back from Devoxx, with loads of ideas on improving our build process
My disc golf mania continues. Just picked up wii game with in on. Fun, and the cricket game was good too.
Just posted java posse #218. Should hit iTunes soon.
http://www.cs.kent.ac.uk/coe/
Cool - my "distinguished lecture" just got announced at my old University (Kent). As Carl put it "Distinguished? They are in for a surprise"
Received my disc golf set - the three discs are a perfect complement to what I already have, so I have a pretty good set now. Back to work..
Although I am excited that my new disc golf set is on the way
Man, all these new Twitter followers, and I have nothing to twitter about...
Watching the number of followers going up before my eyes after mentioning twitter in episode 217 of the Java Posse
Heading in to work and working on the news for the next posse episode.
wanna talk geniuses? I want to who first thought of roasting and grinding up coffee beans, and putting hot water through them. mmmmmm
I hate to admit it, but I really like the slimline Mac keyboards, so much I got one for my linux box...
